markdownContent: That misplacing things is still such an issue even among professionals surprises you. Is it perhaps to do with what Laura mentioned, namely how working with objects becomes really normal? Anyway, you'll have to make do with what you have: the dataset. This should be enough, right? (Ach! Frederic's speech patterns are already subliminally influencing you...) Maybe if any information is missing in the dataset the internet can help out. Luckily you have your trusty Notebook with you, so you can document everything.
